html:
Chapter 13: Custom Races

Since ACKS IIaffords you with the ability to create custom classes, and since race is integrated with class, our “toolbox” approach requires that we also provide rules for creating custom fantasy races.

sections.html: Since ACKS IIaffords you with the ability to create custom classes, and since race is integrated with class, our “toolbox” approach requires that we also provide rules for creating custom fantasy races.

rawMarkdown:
# Chapter 13: Custom Races

Since ***ACKS II***affords you with the ability to create custom classes, and since race is integrated with class, our “toolbox” approach requires that we also provide rules for creating custom fantasy races.
